line_1: Doth a man stutter, look a-squint, or halt;
line_2: Mimics draw humour out of Nature's fault:

line_1: They said, and without farther halt,
line_2: Dauntless march'd onward to the VAULT.

line_1: This was the tale where'er I made a halt,
line_2: And greater houses grew upon the fault;

line_1: The liquorish youth had made an halt;
line_2: And left the pepper-box and salt
